```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(gganimate)
options(gganimate.nframes = 30)
library(gifski)
library(gapminder)
```



```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(continent %in% c("Africa", "Americas", "Asia", "Europe", "Oceania")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = fct_reorder(continent, pop) , y = pop, fill = continent) +
  coord_flip() +
  geom_col() +
  scale_y_continuous(name = "Population in Millionen", labels = c("0","1", "2", "3", "4")) +
  labs(title = "Jahr: {frame_time}",  x = NULL) +                     
  guides(fill = FALSE) + 
  gganimate::transition_time(year) +
  NULL -> anim


animate(
  anim, fps = 60,
  nframes = 240,
  end_pause = 10
)
```
